name: Kishi
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, telepathy 120 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kishi makes one Bite attack and two Spear attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The kishi casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, suggestion
3/day: glibness
1/day: dominate person

special_abilities.name: Fiendish Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The kishi's weapon attacks are magical. When the kishi hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d8 cold damage (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Two Heads
special_abilities.desc: The kishi has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The kishi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
